data.taskTitle: brainstorm how to integrate supabase migration versioning
brainstorm how to integrate supabase migration versioning
data.approach: Explore the existing /source page and git integration architecture to understand the current implementation. Then design a plan for adding Supabase migration versioning as a parallel system with toggle/tab UI, migration timeline, and push/pull capabilities.

data.taskTitle: brainstorm how to integrate supabase migration versioning
summary: Proposed toggle/tab UI on /source page to switch between Git and Supabase views
Designed SupabasePanel component parallel to existing GitPanel
Mapped Supabase CLI commands to IDE operations
findings: Existing Git infrastructure is well-suited for extension
Supabase CLI provides JSON output for migration list
Schema diff can be expensive - recommend on-demand only
Chimaro project already has 48 migrations showing mixed local/remote state
recommendedActions: Create epic task with subtasks for Phase 1-4
Decide on open questions (dry-run default, local DB support, etc.)

quality.preExisting: No existing implementation for Supabase migration UI

suggestedTasks.title: Design Supabase Migration Management UI Component
suggestedTasks.description:
Create a new UI component in the source page to handle Supabase migration tracking. The component should include:
- Toggle/tab to switch between Git and Supabase views
- Display of pending migrations
- Integration with Supabase CLI commands
- Conditional rendering based on Supabase configuration
suggestedTasks.reason: Implement proposed integration strategy for migration versioning

suggestedTasks.title: Define Supabase Configuration Detection Mechanism
suggestedTasks.description:
Develop a method to automatically detect Supabase project configuration, potentially by checking for Supabase-specific folders or configuration files. This will determine when to display the Supabase migration management interface.
- Implement config detection logic
- Create fallback handling for non-Supabase projects
suggestedTasks.reason: Enable dynamic UI rendering based on project type

gotchas: Handle edge cases in migration tracking
